ValidationRule.description: Req 4371:"G6 Planned Date" should only be allowed to be manually edited after the G5 approval is completed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(G6_Planned_Date__c), !ISNEW(), OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Identify Opportunity"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Develop Opportunity"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Create Offer (Bid)"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Win the Case (Negotiate)") ), $Profile.Name<>$Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name, OR( RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Direct_Record_Type', RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Indirect_Record_Type' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: G6 Planned Date cannot be edited prior to G5 Approval and cannot be blank.
